item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Various Artists - The Little Mermaid (Special Edition) (2006) [16bit / 44.1kHz]
item.description:
The Little Mermaid (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack) (Special Edition)
Various Artists, Disney
Soundtrack
2006

1. Ship’s Chorus – Fathoms Below
2. Alan Menken – Main Titles – The The Little Mermaid
3. Alan Menken – Fanfare
4. Daughters of Triton – Daughters Of Triton
5. Jodi Benson – Part Of Your World
6. Samuel E. Wright – Under The Sea
7. Jodi Benson – Part Of Your World (Reprise)
8. Pat Carroll – Poor Unfortunate Souls
9. Rene Auberjonois – Les Poissons
10. Samuel E. Wright – Kiss the Girl
11. Alan Menken – Fireworks
12. Alan Menken – Jig
13. Alan Menken – The Storm
14. Alan Menken – Destruction Of The Grotto
15. Alan Menken – Flotsam And Jetsam
16. Alan Menken – Tour Of The Kingdom
17. Alan Menken – Bedtime
18. Alan Menken – Wedding Announcement
19. Alan Menken – Eric To The Rescue
20. Disney Chorus – Happy Ending
21. Ashley Tisdale – Kiss the Girl
22. Jonas Brothers – Poor Unfortunate Souls
23. Jessica Simpson – Part of Your World
24. Raven-Symoné – Under the Sea
